Posts.Content: Someone needs to Gentle Up on those Needle Biopbsies !!! come on this is 2007 Let's come up with something Less Painful...
Posts.Title: Coping with fear and anxiety

Posts.Content: It would be very foolish Not to have the lumpectomy done I had one 1992 I hear they are so much more advanced then 15 years ago and hospital stay is so much shorter...I was in 7 days Just explain to all the medical people you come in contact with what your fears are....there are some very nice nurses and doctors BUT I totally understand you...my biopsy experience was a nightmare also..I just SWITCHED DOCTORS Be strong  Good Luck A Survivor

Posts.Title: Coping with fear and anxiety

Posts.Content: my aunt is termnial with breast cancer visited for several weeks to chat laugh eat what she can now children don't want any visitors around ? her children won't get on the phone to let us know how she's doing...aunt has more more medications morphine etc.. ? is this normal behavior ? wouldn't you want family around to show love & support
Posts.Title: How to show we care / extended family
